SEARCH
Package utility

Class ColoredPrintStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
java.io.FilterOutputStream
java.io.PrintStream
utility.ColoredPrintStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable
public class ColoredPrintStream extends PrintStream
The class is an extension of PrintStream that allows printing colored text to the terminal. This class allows for color customization in console output. These codes are reset after each print operation to ensure the color does not persist for subsequent text.

  • Constructor Details

    • ColoredPrintStream

      public ColoredPrintStream(PrintStream original)
      Constructs a new ColoredPrintStream that wraps around an existing PrintStream. This class will modify the output by adding color codes before printing the message.
      Parameters:
      original - The original PrintStream that will be wrapped and used for output.

  • Method Details

    • setColor

      public void setColor(String color)
      Sets the color for the text that will be printed.
      Parameters:
      color - The color code to be set for text output.

    • resetColor

      public void resetColor()
      Resets the color to the default color (no color).

    • println

      public void println(String message)
      Prints a message followed by a new line with the current color applied.

      This method overrides PrintStream.println(String) to apply the current color before printing the message. The color is reset after the message.

      Overrides:
      println in class PrintStream
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be printed.

    • print

      public void print(String message)
      Prints a message with the current color applied.

      This method overrides PrintStream.print(String) to apply the current color before printing the message. The color is reset after the message.

      Overrides:
      print in class PrintStream
      Parameters:
